Yandex Disk.name: G04c.01
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company assess freedom of expression and information risks associated with its targeted advertising policies and practices?

Yandex Disk.name: G04c.02
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company assess privacy risks associated with its targeted advertising policies and practices?

Yandex Disk.name: G04c.03
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company assess discrimination risks associated with its targeted advertising policies and practices?

Yandex Disk.name: G04c.04
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company conduct additional evaluation whenever the company’s risk assessments identify concerns?

Yandex Disk.name: G04c.05
Yandex Disk.description: Do senior executives and/or members of the company’s board of directors review and consider the results of assessments and due diligence in their decision-making?

Yandex Disk.name: G04c.06
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company conduct assessments on a regular schedule?

Yandex Disk.name: G04c.07
Yandex Disk.description: Are the company’s assessments assured by an external third party?

Yandex Disk.name: G04c.08
Yandex Disk.description: Is the external third party that assures the assessment accredited to a relevant and reputable human rights standard by a credible organization?
